episodes.title: Inside Japan's Most Dangerous Cult. (Documentary)
episodes.description:
In this documentary, we will dive into the story of Japan’s most dangerous cult, Aum Shinrikyo.
We will explore who the mastermind of this cult was, how this cult arose, and how this cult eventually led to the tragic attack that left Japan with its worst nightmare ever.

-----------------------

*🎹Where I Get My Music:*
I use Epidemic Sound, you could find the playlist with the music we’ve used in this documentary with this link:
